abstract: The European private equity firm will buy Genesys, a call center provider, from the French telecommunications giant Alcatel-Lucent in an all-cash deal.
snippet: The European private equity firm will buy Genesys, a call center provider, from the French telecommunications giant Alcatel-Lucent in an all-cash deal.

headline.main: Permira to Buy Alcatel-Lucent Unit for $1.5 billion
